name: Lovely Crush
description:
Find different cats and return them to their previous catgirls view.
Try to create your own strategy for game.
Explore this game!
Lovely crush will help you to relax from reality



FEATURES

  • 45 levels of relaxed puzzle match game
  • 5 amazing animated catgirls
  • 30 awesome art catgirls
  • relaxing music
  • 2D animation performance
  • 5 achievements

Thank you all for your support of Kawaii Hentai.
